mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your sense of entitlement is our top priority! Get ready to indulge in the luxury of never having to wait for what you deserve."

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this-last week, I stroll into my favorite coffee shop, ready to claim my usual spot by the window. But oh no, what's this? Some *regular* customer has shamelessly snagged MY spot! Can you believe the audacity? I strut up to them like the king I am and demand they vacate immediately. Naturally, they hesitated, probably in shock from my sheer presence. Well, let's just say a little shouting and a lot of foot-stomping later, I not only got my spot back but also a free latte for my "troubles." And that, my friends, is how the world should work-bending to the will of those who truly deserve it. Ah, the sweet taste of entitlement victory!
